title: Introducing: Love Glow
body:
**_Honey_**, the debut EP from San Diego quartet **Love Glow** was one of the most underrated releases of 2017, and deserved far more acclaim than it’s received so far.

Merging early 90’s influences, such as The Cardigans and Pale Saints with flecks of more contemporary acts like Wolf Alice, the five track release is a bold first step for the outfit. EP stand out track _Better_ arguably wouldn’t be out of place on Wolf Alice’s critically acclaimed Visions of a Life, whereas the romantic Velvet has all the makes of a indie pop ballad in waiting, yet both still manage to carve out their own niche. Check out a couple of tracks below, and the full EP [here](https://open.spotify.com/album/69nLc7SRLLVYv5fkJ46xOr).
